body:
You seriously need to take a step back and think about all of this. You're blatantly obnoxious which people don't like. 

You're not some hero here. You're acting like an asshole and you're blatantly insulting people on the internet which is kind of a bitch move. 

You're essentially saying you are here to lower the quality of the site. If I ran this service I would have banned you already. Disagreeing is one thing. Getting pissed off and calling people names is another. Blatantly being a douche for the sake of being a douche is a different story.

author.bio:

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: Jason was permabanned for mentioning Bardfinn's real name which was posted publicly all over social media. If the admins were at all consistent cap should 100% be banned for doing this. He should be banned for it even under normal circumstances, let alone with this double standard. I'm not even sure if that was *legal*. But hey, I guess admins and their special discord mods get special privileges including a free pass from having to follow any of the rules! They make the rules, they don't follow them!
body_html: Jason was permabanned for mentioning Bardfinn's real name which was posted publicly all over social media. If the admins were at all consistent cap should 100% be banned for doing this. He should be banned for it even under normal circumstances, let alone with this double standard. I'm not even sure if that was legal. But hey, I guess admins and their special discord mods get special privileges including a free pass from having to follow any of the rules! They make the rules, they don't follow them!
